verses.verse: מִשְׁלֵ֗י <WH4912> mish-Lei, The proverbs שְׁלֹ֫מֹ֥ה <WH8010> she-Lo-Moh of Solomon פ Peh בֵּ֣ן <WH1121> ben son חָ֭כָם <WH2450> Cha-chom A wise יְשַׂמַּח־ <WH8055> ye-sam-mach- maketh a glad אָ֑ב <WH1> 'Av; father וּבֵ֥ן <WH1121> u-Ven son כְּ֝סִ֗יל <WH3684> ke-Sil, but a foolish תּוּגַ֥ת <WH8424> tu-Gat [is] the heaviness אִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH517> im-Mo. of his mother

לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- not י֭וֹעִילוּ <WH3276> Yo-'i-lu profit אוֹצְר֣וֹת <WH214> otz-Rot Treasures רֶ֑שַׁע <WH7562> Re-sha'; of wickedness וּ֝צְדָקָ֗ה <WH6666> u-tze-da-Kah, nothing but righteousness תַּצִּ֥יל <WH5337> tatz-Tzil delivereth מִמָּֽוֶת׃ <WH4194> mi-Ma-vet. from death

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- not יַרְעִ֣יב <WH7456> yar-'Iv to famish יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> Ne-fesh the soul צַדִּ֑יק <WH6662> tzad-Dik; of the righteous וְהַוַּ֖ת <WH1942> ve-hav-Vat the substance רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> re-sha-'Im of the wicked יֶהְדֹּֽף׃ <WH1920> yeh-Dof. but he casteth away

רָ֗אשׁ <WH7326> Rash, He becometh poor עֹשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> 'o-Seh that dealeth כַף־ <WH3709> chaf- hand רְמִיָּ֑ה <WH7423> re-mi-Yah; [with] a slack וְיַ֖ד <WH3027> ve-Yad but the hand חָרוּצִ֣ים <WH2742> cha-ru-Tzim of the diligent תַּעֲשִֽׁיר׃ <WH6238> ta-'a-Shir. maketh rich

אֹגֵ֣ר <WH103> 'o-Ger He that gathereth בַּ֭קַּיִץ <WH7019> Bak-ka-yitz in summer בֵּ֣ן <WH1121> ben son מַשְׂכִּ֑יל <WH7919> mas-Kil; [is] a wise נִרְדָּ֥ם <WH7290> nir-Dam [but] he that sleepeth בַּ֝קָּצִ֗יר <WH7105> bak-ka-Tzir, in harvest בֵּ֣ן <WH1121> ben [is] a son מֵבִֽישׁ׃ <WH954> me-Vish. that causeth shame

בְּ֭רָכוֹת <WH1293> Be-ra-chot Blessings לְרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> le-Rosh [are] upon the head צַדִּ֑יק <WH6662> tzad-Dik; of the just וּפִ֥י <WH6310> u-Fi the mouth רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> re-sha-'Im, of the wicked יְכַסֶּ֥ה <WH3680> ye-chas-Seh covereth חָמָֽס׃ <WH2555> cha-Mas. but violence

זֵ֣כֶר <WH2143> Ze-cher The memory צַ֭דִּיק <WH6662> Tzad-dik of the just לִבְרָכָ֑ה <WH1293> liv-ra-Chah; [is] blessed וְשֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> ve-Shem but the name רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> re-sha-'Im of the wicked יִרְקָֽב׃ <WH7537> yir-Kav. shall rot

חֲכַם־ <WH2450> cha-cham- The wise לֵ֭ב <WH3820> lev in heart יִקַּ֣ח <WH3947> yik-Kach will receive מִצְוֹ֑ת <WH4687> mitz-Vot; commandments וֶאֱוִ֥יל <WH191> ve-'e-Vil fool שְׂ֝פָתַ֗יִם <WH8193> fa-Ta-yim, but a prating יִלָּבֵֽט׃ <WH3832> yil-la-Vet. shall fall

הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> ho-Lech walketh בַּ֭תֹּם <WH8537> Bat-tom uprightly יֵ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> Ye-lech walks בֶּ֑טַח <WH983> Be-tach; surely וּמְעַקֵּ֥שׁ <WH6140> u-me-'ak-Kesh but he that perverteth דְּ֝רָכָ֗יו <WH1870> de-ra-Chav, his ways יִוָּדֵֽעַ׃ <WH3045> yiv-va-De-a'. shall be known

קֹ֣רֵֽץ <WH7169> Ko-retz He that winketh עַ֭יִן <WH5869> 'A-yin with the eye יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> yit-Ten causeth עַצָּ֑בֶת <WH6094> 'atz-Tza-vet; sorrow וֶאֱוִ֥יל <WH191> ve-'e-Vil fool שְׂ֝פָתַ֗יִם <WH8193> fa-Ta-yim, but a prating יִלָּבֵֽט׃ <WH3832> yil-la-Vet. shall fall

מְק֣וֹר <WH4726> me-Kor [man is] a well חַ֭יִּים <WH2416> Chai-yim of life פִּ֣י <WH6310> pi The mouth צַדִּ֑יק <WH6662> tzad-Dik; of a righteous וּפִ֥י <WH6310> u-Fi the mouth רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> re-sha-'Im, of the wicked יְכַסֶּ֥ה <WH3680> ye-chas-Seh covereth חָמָֽס׃ <WH2555> cha-Mas. but violence

שִׂ֭נְאָה <WH8135> ne-'ah Hatred תְּעוֹרֵ֣ר <WH5782> te-'o-Rer stirreth up מְדָנִ֑ים <WH4090> me-da-Nim; strifes וְעַ֥ל <WH5921> ve-'Al and כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all פְּ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <WH6588> pe-sha-'Im, all sins תְּכַסֶּ֥ה <WH3680> te-chas-Seh covereth אַהֲבָֽה׃ <WH160> 'a-ha-Vah. but love

בְּשִׂפְתֵ֣י <WH8193> be-sif-Tei In the lips נָ֭בוֹן <WH995> Na-Von of him that hath understanding תִּמָּצֵ֣א <WH4672> tim-ma-Tze is found חָכְמָ֑ה <WH2451> choch-mah wisdom וְ֝שֵׁ֗בֶט <WH7626> ve-She-vet, but a rod לְגֵ֣ו <WH1460> le-Gev [is] for the back חֲסַר־ <WH2638> cha-sar- of him that is void לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> Lev. of understanding

חֲכָמִ֥ים <WH2450> cha-cha-Mim Wise יִצְפְּנוּ־ <WH6845> yitz-pe-nu- [men] lay up דָ֑עַת <WH1847> Da-'at; knowledge וּפִֽי־ <WH6310> u-fi- but the mouth אֱ֝וִיל <WH191> 'E-vil of the foolish מְחִתָּ֥ה <WH4288> me-chit-Tah destruction קְרֹבָֽה׃ <WH7138> ke-ro-Vah. [is] near

ה֣וֹן <WH1952> Hon wealth עָ֭שִׁיר <WH6223> 'A-shir The rich man's קִרְיַ֣ת <WH7151> kir-Yat city עֻזּ֑וֹ <WH5797> uz-Zo; [is] his strong מְחִתַּ֖ת <WH4288> me-chit-Tat the destruction דַּלִּ֣ים <WH1800> dal-Lim of the poor רֵישָֽׁם׃ <WH7389> rei-Sham. [is] their poverty

פְּעֻלַּ֣ת <WH6468> pe-'ul-Lat The labour צַדִּ֣יק <WH6662> tzad-Dik of the righteous לְחַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> le-chai-Yim; [tendeth] to life תְּבוּאַ֖ת <WH8393> te-vu-'At the fruit רָשָׁ֣ע <WH7563> ra-Sha' of the wicked לְחַטָּֽאת׃ <WH2403> le-chat-Tat. to sin

אֹ֣רַח <WH734> 'O-rach He [is in] the way לְ֭חַיִּים <WH2416> Le-chai-yim of life שׁוֹמֵ֣ר <WH8104> sho-Mer that keepeth מוּסָ֑ר <WH4148> mu-Sar; instruction וְעוֹזֵ֖ב <WH5800> ve-'o-Zev but he that refuseth תּוֹכַ֣חַת <WH8433> to-Cha-chat reproof מַתְעֶֽה׃ <WH8582> mat-'Eh. erreth

מְכַסֶּ֣ה <WH3680> me-chas-Seh He that hideth שִׂ֭נְאָה <WH8135> ne-'ah hatred שִׂפְתֵי־ <WH8193> sif-tei- lips שָׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> Sha-ker; [with] lying וּמוֹצִ֥א <WH3318> u-mo-Tzi and he that uttereth דִ֝בָּ֗ה <WH1681> dib-Bah, a slander ה֣וּא <WH1931> hu he כְסִֽיל׃ <WH3684> che-Sil. [is] a fool

בְּרֹ֣ב <WH7230> be-Ro In the multitude דְּ֭בָרִים <WH1697> De-va-rim of words לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not יֶחְדַּל־ <WH2308> yech-dal- there wanteth פָּ֑שַׁע <WH6588> Pa-sha'; not sin וְחֹשֵׂ֖ךְ <WH2820> ve-cho-Sech but he that refraineth שְׂפָתָ֣יו <WH8193> se-fa-Tav his lips מַשְׂכִּֽיל׃ <WH7919> mas-Kil. [is] wise

כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> Ke-sef silver נִ֭בְחָר <WH977> Niv-chor [is as] choice לְשׁ֣וֹן <WH3956> le-Shon The tongue צַדִּ֑יק <WH6662> tzad-Dik; of the just לֵ֖ב <WH3820> lev the heart רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> re-sha-'Im of the wicked כִּמְעָֽט׃ <WH4592> kim-'At. [is] little worth

שִׂפְתֵ֣י <WH8193> sif-Tei The lips צַ֭דִּיק <WH6662> Tzad-dik of the righteous יִרְע֣וּ <WH7462> yir-'U feed רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> rab-Bim; many וֶֽ֝אֱוִילִ֗ים <WH191> ve-'e-vi-Lim, but fools בַּחֲסַר־ <WH2638> ba-cha-sar- for want לֵ֥ב <WH3820> lev of wisdom יָמֽוּתוּ׃ <WH4191> ya-Mu-tu. die

בִּרְכַּ֣ת <WH1293> bir-Kat The blessing יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD הִ֣יא <WH1931> hi that תַעֲשִׁ֑יר <WH6238> ta-'a-Shir; it maketh rich וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- no יוֹסִ֖ף <WH3254> yo-Sif and he addeth עֶ֣צֶב <WH6089> 'E-tzev no sorrow עִמָּֽהּ׃ <WH5973> 'im-Mah. is like

כִּשְׂח֣וֹק <WH7814> kis-Chok [It is] as sport לִ֭כְסִיל <WH3684> Lich-sil to a fool עֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> a-Sot to do זִמָּ֑ה <WH2154> zim-Mah; mischief וְ֝חָכְמָ֗ה <WH2451> ve-cha-che-Mah, hath wisdom לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> le-'Ish but a man תְּבוּנָֽה׃ <WH8394> te-vu-Nah. of understanding

מְגוֹרַ֣ת <WH4034> me-go-Rat The fear רָ֭שָׁע <WH7563> Ra-sho' of the wicked הִ֣יא <WH1931> hi he תְבוֹאֶ֑נּוּ <WH935> te-vo-'En-nu; it shall come וְתַאֲוַ֖ת <WH8378> ve-ta-'a-Vat upon him but the desire צַדִּיקִ֣ים <WH6662> tzad-di-Kim of the righteous יִתֵּֽן׃ <WH5414> yit-Ten. shall be granted

כַּעֲב֣וֹר <WH5674> ka-'a-Vor passeth ס֭וּפָה <WH5492> Su-fah As the whirlwind וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> ve-'Ein is no רָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> ra-Sha'; so [is] the wicked וְ֝צַדִּ֗יק <WH6662> ve-tzad-Dik, no [more] but the righteous יְס֣וֹד <WH3247> ye-Sod foundation עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> o-Lam. [is] an everlasting

כַּחֹ֤מֶץ׀ <WH2558> ka-Cho-metz As vinegar לַשִּׁנַּ֗יִם <WH8127> lash-shin-Na-yim, to the teeth וְכֶעָשָׁ֥ן <WH6227> ve-che-'a-Shan and as smoke לָעֵינָ֑יִם <WH5869> la-'ei-Na-yim; to the eyes כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> ken So הֶ֝עָצֵ֗ל <WH6102> he-'a-Tzel, so [is] the sluggard לְשֹׁלְחָֽיו׃ <WH7971> le-sho-le-Chav. to them that send

יִרְאַ֣ת <WH3374> yir-'At The fear יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD תּוֹסִ֣יף <WH3254> to-Sif prolongeth יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> ya-Mim; days וּשְׁנ֖וֹת <WH8141> u-she-Not but the years רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> re-sha-'Im of the wicked תִּקְצֹֽרְנָה׃ <WH7114> tik-Tzo-re-nah. shall be shortened

תּוֹחֶ֣לֶת <WH8431> to-Che-let The hope צַדִּיקִ֣ים <WH6662> tzad-di-Kim of the righteous שִׂמְחָ֑ה <WH8057> sim-Chah; [shall be] gladness וְתִקְוַ֖ת <WH8615> ve-tik-Vat but the expectation רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> re-sha-'Im of the wicked תֹּאבֵֽד׃ <WH6> to-Ved. shall perish

מָע֣וֹז <WH4581> ma-'oz [is] strength לַ֭תֹּם <WH8537> Lat-tom to the upright דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> De-rech The way יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD וּ֝מְחִתָּ֗ה <WH4288> u-me-chit-Tah, but destruction לְפֹ֣עֲלֵי <WH6466> le-Fo-'a-lei [shall be] to the workers אָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> 'A-ven. of iniquity

צַדִּ֣יק <WH6662> tzad-Dik The righteous לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam shall never בַּל־ <WH1077> bal- lest יִמּ֑וֹט <WH4131> yim-Mot; be removed וּ֝רְשָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> u-re-sha-'Im, but the wicked לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo will not יִשְׁכְּנוּ־ <WH7931> yish-ke-nu- shall not inhabit אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> 'A-retz. the earth

פִּֽי־ <WH6310> pi- The mouth צַ֭דִּיק <WH6662> Tzad-dik of the just יָנ֣וּב <WH5107> ya-Nuv bringeth forth חָכְמָ֑ה <WH2451> choch-mah wisdom וּלְשׁ֥וֹן <WH3956> u-le-Shon tongue תַּ֝הְפֻּכ֗וֹת <WH8419> tah-pu-Chot, but the froward תִּכָּרֵֽת׃ <WH3772> tik-ka-Ret. shall be cut out

שִׂפְתֵ֣י <WH8193> sif-Tei The lips צַ֭דִּיק <WH6662> Tzad-dik of the righteous יֵדְע֣וּן <WH3045> ye-de-'Un know רָצ֑וֹן <WH7522> ra-Tzon; what is acceptable וּפִ֥י <WH6310> u-Fi but the mouth רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> re-sha-'Im, of the wicked תַּהְפֻּכֽוֹת׃ <WH8419> tah-pu-Chot. [speaketh] frowardness
